name: SAE International
goal: SAE International is a global association and standards developing organization for engineering professionals in various industries. By uniting over 128,00 engineers and technical experts, SAE drives knowledge and expertise in the fields of automotive, aerospace and commercial vehicles. SAE International also devotes resources to projects and programs in STEM education, professional certification, and collegiate design competitions.
interests: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU policy on standardisation
Digital Agenda (automation, connectivity, ITS)
Single European Sky
EU Aviation Strategy
Cybersecurity
EU Defence policy
EU Space policy
H2020
Unmanned Aircraft Systems/RPAS
